item.title: Haldiram's is promoting mithai in India that is free from adulteration at SwaadMarket
item.description:
Source: SwaadMarket.com website. Haldiram’s, a leading brand in the Indian sweets market, is now available on SwaadMarket.com. SwaadMarket is an Indian online marketplace that guarantees authentic, hygienic, and pure sweets and other food products. Giving Indian sweets (mithai) as gifts is a long-standing tradition, but recently the mithai market has declined due to a lack of new ideas and concerns about hygiene and purity. This trend inspired both companies to start promoting unadulterated sweets within India...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/haldiram-s-is-promoting-mithai-in-india-that-is-free-from-adulteration-at-swaadmarket/
